experience: You and Kev both know Dan Olson, Steve Getman, and 7 others
Sr. Manager - Worldwide Marcom Facility Manager

Senior Manager of design, strategic space planning, and facility management for Apple Marcom group worldwide. Plan construction, interior design projects and improvements. Oversee facility management operations team within Marcom and interaction with corporate services including maintenance, janitorial, commute, real estate and security. Manage separate team of Marcom executive assistants.

Provide administration management, operations and facility maintenance. Manage capital construction projects and agency procurement including office equipment, robust travel program and all lines of insurance. Provide space planning and relocation management, furniture and facility design and manage agency events.

Corporate space planning; relocation planning and execution, office start up from space acquisition to move in day and beyond.Event planning, design and production. Lighting and stage design, custom furniture and linens, flooring, and tenting. Excel at creating events in non-traditional spaces. Graphic and floral designer.
Consulting on Space Planning, Facilities Administration and Staffing.
CHOC Children’s Hospital of Orange County
Provide event design and planning as a vendor partner. Planned three annual galas with three different Gala Chairs, 2010, 2011 and 2012.

Kev has been one of the most pleasantly enjoyable people I have ever had the pleasure of working with. I purposely ask to be put on projects that she is involved in.

summary: Facilities professional with more than twenty years of experience in Project Management, Space Planning, Corporate Interiors and Furnishings, and Facilities Management. Seventeen years of experience in large ad agencies, with strong knowledge of agency operations. Event planner and producer with 19 years of experience in high end, extensive production events. Skills include lighting, staging, custom furnishings, linens, floral design, extensive space planning and event flow experience as well as stage management and auction experience. Specialties: Event Management & Design, Project Management, Space Planning, Procurement and Facilities Management
